titleStmt.title: A seasonable and Christian caution against the provoking sin of pride and other manifest evils, and of the judgements threatned because thereof, compassionately tendered to the inhabitants of London, and elsewhere concerned as a warning to repentence. / [by] G.W.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
